definition: aggregate (sand or gravel used in concrete 混凝土)

sentences.english: Prepacked aggregate concrete which is a new technique has been used in the bed plate of Zhongyuan 60000 dwt Dock.
sentences.chinese: 中遠船塢底板採用預填骨料升漿砼新工藝。

sentences.english: The composite aggregate is composed of LWA and normal aggregate.
sentences.chinese: 複合骨料系混凝土中的普通骨料被輕骨料取代而成。

sentences.english: The composite aggregate is composed of LWA and normal aggregate.
sentences.chinese: 複合骨料系混凝土中的普通骨料被輕骨料取代而成。

sentences.english: The composite aggregate is composed of LWA and normal aggregate.
sentences.chinese: 複合骨料系混凝土中的普通骨料被輕骨料取代而成。

sentences.english: Square slabs were cut from cubes cast with various aggregate sizes .
sentences.chinese: 從具有不同骨料粒度的立方澆注塊中切出方形板塊。

sentences.english: Concrete with river gravel or quartzite aggregate is of medium difficulty to cut.
sentences.chinese: 溪砂石骨料混凝土或石英岩身材中等難度降低。

sentences.english: The aggregate size determines the area .
sentences.chinese: 此面積的大小由骨料粒度決定。

sentences.english: It calls for using waste brick as aggregate of concrete to protect environment.
sentences.chinese: 倡導用碎磚做混凝土骨料，保護生態環境。

sentences.english: A series of research on preparation technique of hard-shell pumice concrete are researched.
sentences.chinese: 對硬殼浮石骨料混凝土的製備工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: It has to be crushed after firing and the aggregate therefore has sharp corners .
sentences.chinese: 煅燒後需要進行破碎，因此骨料具有尖銳的棱角。

sentences.english: The floors are to be built with hollow tiles or with lightweight aggregate .
sentences.chinese: 樓板計劃用空心磚或輕骨料建造。

sentences.english: Square slabs were cut from cubes cast with various aggregate sizes.
sentences.chinese: 從具有不同骨料粒度的立方澆注塊中切出方形板塊。

sentences.english: In this paper, the author consider that the research on High Strength Recycled Aggregate(HSRA) will be more and more important.
sentences.chinese: 本文作者認爲對高強度再生骨料的研究將越來越重要。

definition: to sinter/to agglomerate ore by burning
see 球磨機|球磨机[qiu2 mo2 ji1]
mining waste/waste remaining after processing ore/tailings
